response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth $10,000. However, to make this proposition attractive, I am offering it to you at $9,500. This is an exceptional deal considering the high demand and limited availability of the product. Please let me know if this offer meets your requirements.", "product_price": 9500}
